title: Promotionals
body:
I am in silver 5 and I have gotten to my promotionals several times but what is very annoying is that if I get one of the free wins then lose the next game when I have one more game left to play it says my promotionals have been lost

This has happened to me twice I would really like to know if someone else has had this problem or just me

replies.body: Did you ever dodge during your promos? If you did, it would count as a loss in your promo series and make you [**ineligible for Promo Helper**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204010760-Ranked-Play-FAQ#h2q3) the next time you entered series.
Sorry it took so long for me to get back to you but one time I did dodge but others I had got a free win and had lost one after that and it  set me back to no promos
but I think this may be a visual glitch or something
Don't worry. I'm S4 right now and I got to my promos 3 or 4 times WITH the free win and lost the next 2 games. it happens and it does suck.
do you know why this happens and will it be fixed to where I am in my promos with one win and loss?
I have no idea why it happens. You'll still get the free win if you keep on losing in the promos. It's all in the luck of the draw.
